title.en: Information and Information Work in Career Counselling

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

course_main_structural_unit.address:
Näituse 2
50409 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
The following topics will be covered during the course:
The main concepts of information science and career-counselling theories that are relevant to career information
Provision of career-information based on the theory of J. Sampson
Educating the clients in how to make work- and education-related choices, and how to increase their information competences
the management and communication of career information
an overview of the education system, labor market and pay system
interacting with media
description.et:
Kursuses käsitletakse järgmisi teemasid:
Infoteaduse põhimõisted ja peamised karjääriteooriad, mis on seotud karjääriinfoga.
Individuaalne karjääriinfo vahendamine, aluseks J. Sampson`i teooria.	
Kliendi juhendamine tööotsimis- ja haridusvalikute tegemise oskuste ning infopädevuse arendamisel.
Karjääriinfo haldamine ja edastamine.
Ülevaade haridussüsteemsit, tööturust ja palgainfost. 
Suhtlemine meediaga

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to increase the participants' knowledge about what constitutes and how to provide client-centered career-information by introducing the following topics: educational system, labor market, pay system, media.
objectives.et: Suurendada teadmisi kliendi vajadustele tuginevast karjääriinfo vahendamise protsessist ja parandada  sellealaseid praktilisi oskuseid, ennekõike teemade haridussüsteem, tööturg, palgainfo ja meedia käsitlemise kaudu.

learning_outcomes.en: The students will know the main concepts of information science and those career-counselling theories that are relevant to career information
They will be acquainted with the provision of career-information based on the theory of J. Sampson
learning_outcomes.et: - teab infoteaduse põhimõisted ja peamisi karjääriteooriad, mis on seotud karjääriinfoga.

learning_outcomes.en: They will be able to educate their clients in how to make work- and education-related choices, and how to increase their information competences
learning_outcomes.et: - teab J. Sampson`i teooriale tugineva individuaalse karjääriinfo vahendamise põhimõtteid.

learning_outcomes.en: They will know how to manage and communicate career information
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab juhendada klienti tööotsimis- ja haridusvalikute tegemise oskuste ning infopädevuse arendamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: They will be familiar with the education system, labor market and pay system
learning_outcomes.et: - teab, kuidas otsida infot järgmiste teemade kohta: haridussüsteem, tööturg ja palgainfo.

learning_outcomes.en: They will know how to interact with media

grade_preconditions.et:
Kõigi arvestustööde sooritamine, lõpuseminaris osalemine. 
Täpsem info Moodles.
